Assessment.QuestionText: Which of these statements about the <font face="courier new">ProgressBar</font> control are true and which statements are false?

Options.Option: The <font face="courier new">Value</font> property gets or sets the minimum and maximum values of the <font face="courier new">ProgressBar</font> control.
The <font face="courier new">Increment</font> method sets the current position of the <font face="courier new">ProgressBar</font> control.
The <font face="courier new">Step</font> property increments the current position of the <font face="courier new">ProgressBar</font> by the specified value.
The Marquee ProgressBar gives an idea about how long the process will take to complete.
The <font face="courier new">ProgressBar</font> control implements visual styles.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that’s correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that’s incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)–(False), (B)–(False), (C)–(False), (D)–(False), and (E)-(True).
